short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically gets all the Twitch.tv Channel Points for you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of collecting the Twitch Channel Points all by yourself?

Don't worry, this extension got your back and collects them all automatically for you.
